page.title: 09AMERICANS IN THATCHAM
page.content: The reason the Americans are in England is because they are following their own or their husband/wife's job. They came to Thatcham because the Greenham Common Air Base is very close and because there are some big housing estates where homes are cheaper than at Greenham. They say that they prefer living in America to Great Britain mainly because of the climate (lots of rain) which is quite cold but without summer heat. In America it may be cold in winter but they think the heat in summer makes the climate preferable to ours. Whilst on the subject of families, one of them had a bit of English, Irish, Spanish and American-Indian in her! They were not allowed to give their opinion of the Greenham Peace Women. On the whole the Americans don't mind living here, much!
